name: The Last Saintess
description:
"The Temple of Discipline dedicated to Undiana, the Goddess of Discipline...
However, in the goddess' indifference, they disappeared one by one."

"And here in Andalun, the last remaining temple of order was also
dying its light due to the undead from the tomb of the traitors."

"From now on, everything will be their end..."

Claire, the last remaining priest, decides to risk life with the soldiers
to fight against the undead for the safe evacuation of the villagers.

[How to play]
The offensive of the undead begins.
Gather holy power to summon soldiers and strengthen the starlight of Hellendil to defeat the undead.
If the undead destroy this place, it will be game over.

[Game Features]
▷ Charming characters
▷ Character Tower Defense
▷ Game Mode: Story Mode, Endless Mode
▷ Various skins and specials that can be unlocked while playing
